article_text:
Our new visitor guide hits the streets Saturday, May 20. It's chock full of sights, events and places to have fun. What are your tourist plans, if any?

You voted:

article_metadata.author:
NORA AVERY-PAGE
H&N Staff Reporter

og.description: Dr. Glenn Gailis started working in Klamath Falls in 1975 and, after almost 40 years in the community, he’s seen many changes.
og.title: Fresh faces, better medical care

Our new visitor guide hits the streets Saturday, May 20.
